original: Zakrisison, Gustaf Emanuel, bankdirektör, Vetlanda, f. 10/2/79 i Vetlanda av T. P. Z. o. Eva Karlsson. G. 17 m. Märta Sjöberg. Barn: Brita f. 17, Bengt 20, Ingrid 23. — Folk-högsk., hand:sk. Bankdir. i Vetlanda fr. 32. Styr:led. i Östra här. sparb. sed. 14, ordf. 33, nämndem. sed. 23, led. av styr. f. Smål. o. Ölands sparb :-fören., fd. ordf. i komm:fullm. o. pens :nd. RVO, Brand- o. livförs. A-B Skånes ftj :M, Jönköp. 1. hemb :förb. GM, MannerheimM. Zandén, Bo Valfrid Jean Sörman, direktörsassistent, löjtnant, Göteborg, f. 16/12/13 i St. Malm, Södermani. 1., av fd. stat :chef v. SJ J. R. Z. o. Valborg Sörman. G. 39 m. Majalisa Liljegren. — Avg:ex. fr. hand:gymn. 32, stud. v. hand:högsk. i Gbg 37-38, res :off :ex 40, genomg. final course v. The Royal Inst. of chart. shipbrokers i London 34. Utr. språk- o. yrkesstud. 29-31, 33-34. Tj :man i Red. A-B Transatlantic 35, tj :man o. sekr. i Réü. A-B Transoil 36, i Red. A-B Tankoil 37-40, rev. i div. föret., d;ir:assist. i Red. A-B Transoil o. Tankoil i Gbg fr. 38. Löjtn. i Hall. reg. res. Kamrer o. sekr. i stift. Wilh. Lundgrens minne, medl. i Naut. fören., Rydbergsgastarna m. fl. fr. 39. Hob-bies: konst, segling.
translated: Zakrisson, Gustaf Emanuel, bank director, Vetlanda, b. 10/2/79 in Vetlanda. Parents: T.P. Z. and Eva Karlsson. Married in 1917 to Märta Sjöberg. Children: Brita b. 1917, Bengt b. 1920, Ingrid b. 1923. Attended folk high school and commercial school. Became bank director in Vetlanda from 1932. Board member of Östra härads sparbank since 1914, chairman since 1933. Magistrate since 1923. Member of the board for Smålands and Öland's savings bank federation. Former chairman of the municipal council and pension committee. Awarded the Royal Order of Vasa. Employed at Brand- och Livförsäkringsaktiebolag Skånes ftj :M and Jönköpings 1. hembygdsförening. Married secondly to Mannerheim M. Zandén, Bo Valfrid Jean Sörman, director's assistant, lieutenant, Gothenburg, b. 16/12/13 in St. Malm, Södermani. Son of former head of SJ, J.R. Z. and Valborg Sörman. Married in 1939 to Majalisa Liljegren. Graduated from commercial gymnasium in 1932, studied at the Gothenburg School of Business from 1937-1938, passed the reserve officer's examination in 1940. Completed the final course at The Royal Institute of Charted Shipbrokers in London in 1934. Studied languages and profession abroad from 1929-1931, 1933-1934. Employed at Red. A-B Transatlantic in 1935, employed as secretary and manager at Réü. A-B Transoil in 1936, Red. A-B Tankoil in 1937-1940. Auditor in various companies, director's assistant at Red. A-B Transoil and Tankoil in Gothenburg from 1938. Lieutenant in Halland regiment, reserve. Treasurer and secretary in the Wilh. Lundgren Foundation. Member of the Nautical Society, Rydberg's Guests, and others from 1939. Hobbies: art, sailing.
